E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Dave Otto
Dear Sir,
Dave Otto has nothing more to prove at A Osceola Astros!
He has an ERA of 3.57 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Cliff Speck



Date: Monday, 6/23/1988
Subject: Progress of Chris C. Jones
Dear Sir,
Chris C. Jones has an AVG of .310 at AA Columbus Astros!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Mark Whiten
Dear Sir,

to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 9/4/1988
Subject: Pete J. Smith healing process
Pete J. Smith is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
